description: Real-time trip update data from GTFS-RT feeds

name: record_id
description: Unique identifier for this trip update record

name: entity_id
description: GTFS-RT entity identifier for this trip update

name: timestamp
description: Timestamp when this trip update was recorded

name: timestamp_s
description: Unix timestamp in seconds

name: route_id
description: Route identifier this trip belongs to

name: trip_id
description: Trip identifier this update applies to

name: start_date
description: Start date of the trip in YYYYMMDD format

name: start_time
description: Scheduled start time of the trip

name: schedule_relationship
description: Relationship to the scheduled trip

name: delay
description: Delay in seconds from scheduled time

name: stop_sequence
description: Sequence number of the stop in the trip

name: stop_id
description: Stop identifier this update applies to

name: actual_arrival_s
description: Actual arrival time in Unix seconds

name: arrival_delay
description: Arrival delay in seconds

name: arrival_uncertainty
description: Uncertainty of arrival time in seconds

name: actual_departure_s
description: Actual departure time in Unix seconds

name: departure_delay
description: Departure delay in seconds

name: departure_uncertainty
description: Uncertainty of departure time in seconds

name: vehicle_id
description: Vehicle identifier serving this trip

name: vehicle_label
description: User-visible vehicle label

name: vehicle_license_plate
description: Vehicle license plate number

name: created_at
description: Auto-appended warehouse timestamp

name: updated_at
description: Auto-appended warehouse timestamp
